text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 24 in F-sharp major, Op. 78, also known as à Thérèse is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written in 1809 for Countess Thérèse von Brunswick. Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM. ==Form== The sonata is in two sections, called movements: ==References== Piano Sonata 024
title: Piano Sonata No. 24 (Beethoven)
